verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> was coming, <S%H935><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> with him. So he divided <S%H2673><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> maids. <S%H8198><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the maids <S%H8198><s%> and their children <S%H3206><s%> in front, <S%H7223><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> and her children <S%H3206><s%> next, <S%H314><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> last. <S%H314><s%>

But he himself <S%H1931><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> on ahead <S%H6440><s%> of them and bowed <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to his brother. <S%H251><s%>

Then Esau <S%H6215><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> him and embraced <S%H2263><s%> him, and fell <S%H5307><s%> on his neck <S%H6677><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him, and they wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And he lifted <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> and the children, <S%H3206><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> with you?" So he said, <S%H559><s%> "The children <S%H3206><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has graciously <S%H2603><s%> given <S%H2603><s%> your servant. <S%H5650><s%>"
Then the maids <S%H8198><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> with their children, <S%H3206><s%> and they bowed <S%H7812><s%> down. <S%H7812><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> with her children, <S%H3206><s%> and they bowed <S%H7812><s%> down; <S%H7812><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> with Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and they bowed <S%H7812><s%> down. <S%H7812><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4310><s%> do you mean by all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> company <S%H4264><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have met <S%H6298><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "To find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%> "
But Esau <S%H6215><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I have <S%H3426><s%> plenty, <S%H7227><s%> my brother; <S%H251><s%> let what <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H1961><s%> be your own."

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H408><s%> please, <S%H4994><s%> if <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> then take <S%H3947><s%> my present <S%H4503><s%> from my hand, <S%H3027><s%> for I see <S%H7200><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> as one sees <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and you have received <S%H7521><s%> me favorably. <S%H7521><s%>

"Please <S%H4994><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> my gift <S%H1293><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has been brought <S%H935><s%> to you, because <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has dealt <S%H2603><s%> graciously <S%H2603><s%> with me, and because <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H3426><s%> plenty. <S%H3605><s%>" Thus he urged <S%H6484><s%> him and he took <S%H3947><s%> [it.]
Then Esau said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us take <S%H5265><s%> our journey <S%H5265><s%> and go, <S%H1980><s%> and I will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> you."

But he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "My lord <S%H113><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> that the children <S%H3206><s%> are frail <S%H7390><s%> and that the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> which are nursing <S%H5763><s%> are a care <S%H5921><s%> to me. And if they are driven <S%H1849><s%> hard <S%H1849><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> will die. <S%H4191><s%>

"Please <S%H4994><s%> let my lord <S%H113><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> his servant; <S%H5650><s%> and I will proceed <S%H5095><s%> at my leisure, <S%H328><s%> according to the pace <S%H7272><s%> of the cattle <S%H4399><s%> that are before <S%H6440><s%> me and according to the pace <S%H7272><s%> of the children, <S%H3206><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%> at Seir. <S%H8165><s%>"

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let me leave <S%H3322><s%> with you some <S%H4480><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with me." But he said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> need is there? Let me find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%>"
So Esau <S%H6215><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%> to Seir. <S%H8165><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> to Succoth; <S%H5523><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> for himself a house, <S%H1004><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> booths <S%H5521><s%> for his livestock, <S%H4735><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> is named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>

Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> safely <S%H8003><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> when he came <S%H935><s%> from Paddan-aram, and camped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And he bought <S%H7069><s%> the piece <S%H2513><s%> of land <S%H2513><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he had pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor, <S%H2544><s%> Shechem's father, for one hundred <S%H1><s%> pieces <S%H3967><s%> of money. <S%H7192><s%>
Then he erected <S%H5324><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it El-Elohe-Israel.
